longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports issued to nationals of China (People's Rep.) must
  be valid for a minimum of 1 month beyond the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Macao (SAR China) Travel Permit.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months: 
 - for holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR China)
   passports; 
Visa required, except for Holders of an APEC Business Travel
Card (ABTC) endorsed  Valid for travel to NZL : 
 - for a max. stay of 3 months and traveling on business. 
Minors:
- Minors entering New Zealand 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.  
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination. 
Warning:
- Passport number and nationality must match those stated on
  the APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC).
- Holders of passports issued by China (People's Rep.)
  traveling under the New Zealand visa-waiver, must hold
  return/onward tickets. (SEE NOTE 53749) 
    NOTE 53749: Exempt are holders of authorization issued by
   New Zealand's immigration authorities waiving the return
   ticket requirement. 
- Visitors holding a visa that specifies the requirement to
  hold an outward ticket must hold return/onward tickets. (SEE
  NOTE 53749)
    NOTE 53749: Exempt are holders of authorization issued by
   New Zealand's immigration authorities waiving the return
   ticket requirement
